description: Accepts a resource type and returns a list of resource identifiers that are aggregated for a specific resource type across accounts and regions. A resource identifier includes the resource type, ID, (if available) the custom resource name, source account, and source region. You can narrow the results to include only resources that have specific resource IDs, or a resource name, or source account ID, or source region. For example, if the input consists of accountID 12345678910 and the region is us-east-1 for resource type AWS::EC2::Instance then the API returns all the EC2 instance identifiers of accountID 12345678910 and region us-east-1.

parameters.name: ConfigurationAggregatorName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration aggregator.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of resources that you want Config to list in the response.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters the results based on the ResourceFilters object. AccountId (string) --- The 12-digit source account ID. ResourceId (string) --- The ID of the resource. ResourceName (string) --- The name of the resource. Region (string) --- The source region.

nested_items.name: ResourceIdentifiers
nested_items.description: Returns a list of ResourceIdentifiers objects.

nested_items.name: SourceAccountId
nested_items.description: The 12-digit account ID of the source account.

nested_items.name: SourceRegion
nested_items.description: The source region where data is aggregated.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned on a previous page that you use to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
